name: OneVPN - One VPN - Unlimited OpenVPN, Turbo Proxy
description: Free & OneTouch & Easy to Connect OneVPN  100% FREE VPN Client. Permanently free, No payment, No bandwidth limitation.  Well designed: One touch to connect to Free VPN server    Privacy Guard & Secured Connection & Anonymous  All traffic is encrypted by One VPN to protect privacy.  Nothing about your online behavior would be tracked.  Secure the connection under any WiFi hotspot to provide anonymous browsing.    Fast & Stable Connection  Dynamically adjusted server list to ensure best servers provided.  Always provide the server with high speed. Provided servers cover U.S, Germany, Japan, Korean, Canada, etc.  Provide service with OpenVPN protocol   VPN features  Bypass VoIP and Video Call restrictions, such as: Skype, WhatsCall, Viber.  Unblock restricted websites: YouTube or Facebook (in part of countries) Bypass school firewall  Provide secured internet connection  Hide your real IP address
